Texts.Chs: 把^orange;10份甲醇^reset;带给^green;绿色尾巴的猫^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the 10 ^orange;Methanol^reset; to the green-tailed cat at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 太好了。你所做的相当有用，并且应该得到相当的赞赏。拿上^green;这个EPP模块^reset;吧，也许你能从它身上发现更多的用途。
Texts.Eng: Excellent. This will be quite useful, and goes quite appreciated. Take ^green;this augment^reset;, perhaps you can get more use out of it than I ever could.

Texts.Chs: 我可能需要一些^orange;甲醇^reset;但是我手头没有现成的材料。带给我10份^orange;甲醇^reset;，我会给你一些有用的东西作为回报的。不是一个手榴弹。我承诺。
Texts.Eng: I could use some ^orange;Methanol^reset; but don't have the materials handy. Bring me 10 ^orange;Methanol^reset; and I'll toss you something useful in return. Not a grenade. Promise.
